description:
Day 2 becomes a little more focused on Lily and testing her abilities. She made it through the shock and awe, now it's time to see what she is capable of doing as a potential slave. She is enthusiastic about her training and her willingness proves that she has made this her ultimate goal.
We test her sexual ability along with more protocol and position training. Her fear of electricity is tested and she shows, little by little, that she is going to get over this fear.
title: Lily LaBeau Day 2
